name: Shinobi Underworld
description:
A fast-paced and frantic 4 player local-multiplayer platform fighter.  Mechanics are simple, just 3 buttons, but the pace is fast which lets the best players maneuver around the map incredibly quickly. The game is best experienced on the Phillytron Arcade Cabinet (check it out if you are ever in the Philadelphia Area) but also plays great with 4 controllers! 

Most any controllers should be supported but the game was tested with XboxOne, DS4, 8bitdo, & Steam Controllers.
